name: nsrdude
text: A comment left by nsrdude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, sirhan_duran, ishuta, ButterMoths, saddestking, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, Hipjiverobot, Jesler729, Manxome, 7th_shot, decagon, Jhunter, Connellingus, furysama, cryptfiend85, rhymesforkids, farqussus, ActualTaunt, Howard, Sweetlips, MortisInvictus, DrSkradley, luckypyjamas, aHatOfPig, LaserBlade, Magb, shoethings, diplomat76, TheSoulBear, FinnS, Boyd, echidnaboy, Saint, afvbs)

name: greyfield
text: PHILIPPE IS FI- ah, screw it.

name: manxome
text: This comment would've been much improved if not for the "Lol,".

name: peng33
text: ONE DOES NOT LAUGH IN THE PRESENCE OF SUCH A SACK.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I wish just once I could use the phrase "wicked sack" in conversation and people would not look at me funny.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, ishuta, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, NotGodot, goocifer, cmjhogan, farqussus, the_dingle, ConnorMc, Zem, FinnS, cailetshadow, trawser, Carten)

name: apocowarg
text: I think you need new friends centipede.

name: wonelove
text:
indeed.
people who cannot accept the term have no wicked sack

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sakana, Overmedicated, NotGodot, fosters, hellsfruition, farqussus, the_dingle, ConnorMc, Zem, trawser, Carten)

name: magb
text: I believe it.

name: farqussus
text: you'd better

name: cracklewater
text:
How else can Phillipe pedal the Sex Bicycle, but with his wicked sack?

His legs sure ain't long enough.

name: lastlarf
text: I believe Phillipe's sack is wicked.

name: deancain29
text: How can I work the phrase 'wicked sack' into a conversation?

name: william
text: Easy! Next time someone's talkin' noise be like "you must have some pretty wicked sack to be talkin' that way."  I cold used it yesterday.

name: tekende
text:
But what if their response is "You'd better believe that I have wicked sack"? I mean, how do you respond to that?

You can't.

name: boredom_man
text: A respectful nod and grunt, as befits your Fellow of Wicked Sack.

name: daidai
text: Those with wicked sacks don't consider themselves fellows. They are competitors.

name: epicurus
text: Learning to work wicked sack into various things is a rite of passage.

name: farqussus
text: I remember when my parents tried to tell me about working my wicked sack into stuff. Like, I know this stuff already. Gross!

name: lizjones
text: I like how Philippe's sunglasses don't rest on his ears.

name: darkwaffle
text: Wicked sack entirely trumps rad chilies.

name: odei
text: "You'd better believe I have wicked sack" should be on a t-shirt.

name: zapatos
text: Maybe a button or patch.  Then you could button/sew that onto a backpack and go to school with your books.

name: odei
text: I... what?

name: zapatos
text: Well you get a button or a patch with "you'd better believe i have wicked sack" and then you take that button or patch, and attach it to your backpack.  The backpack being a wicked sack.  Or you pin it to your balls?  I'm not sure.

name: odei
text: Oh. I was mostly confused about the school thing. I don't think they'd appreciate it if I just turned up with some books.

name: zapatos
text: Yeah, it is kind of weird chillin' on the elementary Big Toys, readin' some Palahiuk.

name: boyd
text: You'd think that the sex bicycle would have training wheels.

name: honesttom
text: It's always wise to take precautions.

name: zapatos
text: Training Wheels aren't dangerous or sexy.

name: tekende
text: They are if you're a pedophile.

name: zapatos
text: No, they still aren't.  I'm down for the thrill of the chase.

name: cailetshadow
text:
Todd is shown here in the classic Jerry Springer "Oh no you dit'int!" pose.
But even this is no match for Philippe's wicked sack.

name: foxtrotamend
text: Oh snap, Philippe has gone BAD!  Awesome!

name: semiquaver
text: This is like when Angel lost his soul.  Damn.

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh man soulless Angel's about a trillion times better than regular Angel.

name: semiquaver
text: the bit where he smokes a hooker's cigarette through her throat ranks up there in the list of best tv moments

name: heccibiggs
text: His chasing and killing Miss Calendar and then leaving her for Giles to find is like one of the most harrowing, hard-to-watch-but-can't-look-away things ever.

name: i_love_kate
text: JENNYYYYYYYYYY

name: geysershitdick
text: It would be physically impossible for Philippe to properly use that bicycle...er, Sex Bicycle.

name: streever
text: clearly you are unaware of his wicked sack

name: nucleargeranium
text: A comment left by nucleargeranium was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, the_dingle, shirt145)

name: finish_him
text: Man I'm trying to be judicious with my strip ratings this time through but this whole arc just earns five after five.

name: cyberia
text: This strip is made so much better if you imagine Philippe talking with Billy Idol's voice.

name: radarjammer
text: It's like Billy's soul rocked Philippe into puberty.

name: vweep
text:
I tried to not touch the Sex Bicycle.

I have not looked at ducks the same way ever since.

name: hpk
text: I personally have not looked at ducks the same way ever since I saw this

name: tekende
text: Holy shit.

name: zapatos
text: That is a pretty neat bicycle.

name: mikeronomicon
text: His sack is so wicked it has horns and smells of brimstone.

name: tripleg
text: i'm not normally one to comment on meta-features of the strip, but the combonation of bravado in the strip title and meekness in the alt-text just slays me every time

name: random_shorts
text: BELIEVE that shit, Todd.

name: greenkoolayd
text: buh-LEE' dat!

name: dusty
text: If achewood were made into a movie, the last line of this strip would be one of the lines that flashed by in the trailer for it while dramatic music plays (because achewood wouldn't be a comedy, but rather a serious movie with funny parts) Leonardo DiCaprio would play Phillipe, at first I know this sounds offensive, but watch "whats eating Gilbert grape" now imagine a portrayal halfway between that and his acting in the man in the iron mask, which by the way, gave him experience playing a character named Phillipe, so when you're watching it and someone calls him Phillipe and he looks, you would be like "I really felt that his name is actually Phillipe."

name: teezee
text: In this installment of Achewood it is subtly revealed that Todd no longer wears a thong.

name: teezee
text: You ever read your own comment from sevral months ago and think "hey that's what I would have said" before you realize it was you?  Alcoholism lets you enjoy life multiple times over, it's the pictures that are a bitch.

name: soticoto
text:
I'm puzzled as to why I can no longer change my votes.
I gave this a 4 last time, but want to promote it to a 5 now. Why can I not? =(

name: lizard
text: It is heart-rending to see Onstad so embarrassed by the alt text.
